name: Electrode
flavorText:
It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.flavorText:
Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.
